field.name: menutype
field.label: Select Menu
field.description: Select a menu from the list

field.name: base
field.label: Base Item
field.description: Select a menu item to always be used as the base for the menu display. You must set the Start Level to the same level or higher than the level of the base item. This will cause the module to be displayed on all assigned pages. If Current is selected the currently active item is used as the base. This causes the module to only display when the parent menu item is active.

field.name: startLevel
field.label: Start Level
field.description: Level to start rendering the menu at. Setting the start and end levels to the same # and setting 'Show Sub-menu Items' to yes will only display that single level.

field.name: endLevel
field.label: End Level
field.description: Level to stop rendering the menu at. If you choose 'All', all levels will be shown depending on 'Show Sub-menu Items' setting.

field.name: showAllChildren
field.label: Show Sub-menu Items
field.description: Expand the menu and make its sub-menu items always visible.

field.name: backText
field.label: Back text
field.description: Text to display for the 'back' menu item.

field.name: colorSet
field.label: Color Set
field.description: Select a color set for your menu.

field.name: color1
field.label: Color1
field.description: Color 1 for the menu, button color

field.name: color2
field.label: Color2
field.description: Color 2 for the menu, button hover color

field.name: Animation
field.label: Animation
field.description: Select an animation type for the menu.

field.name: loadjQuery
field.label: Load jQuery
field.description: Load jQuery from Google APIs? Not necessary of your template already loads jQuery.

field.name: tag_id
field.label: Menu Tag ID
field.description: An ID attribute to assign to the root UL tag of the menu (optional)

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the menu items

field.name: window_open
field.label: Target Position
field.description: JavaScript values to position a popup window, e.g. top=50,left=50,width=200,height=300
